query: What new materials are being explored for quantum computing hardware in 2024, and what are their potential benefits?

results.title: Materials for Quantum Technologies 2026-2046: Market, Trends ...
results.content: This report analyzes the opportunities and emerging solutions in materials for quantum computing, quantum sensing, and quantum communications, with the total market opportunity for superconducting chips, PICs, and diamond for quantum technologies anticipated to reach US$3.38 billion by 2036 and US$18.9 billion by 2046 with a total CAGR of 23.1% over the full forecast period. This report aims to give a detailed examination of the material opportunities in the quantum technology industry, focusing on technical innovations, market forces, and supply chain dynamics across superconductors, photonics, and nanomaterials. | Additional Information Can Be Found in the IDTechEx Market Research Report "Quantum Computing Market 2026-2046: Technology, Trends, Players, Forecasts" |. | Additional information can be found in the IDTechEx market research report "Quantum Sensors Market 2026-2046: Technology, Trends, Players, Forecasts" |. | Additional information can be found in the IDTechEx market research report "Quantum Communication Market 2024-2034: Technology, Trends, Players, Forecasts" |.

results.title: Quantum Computing Applications: 8 Real-World Use Cases in 2026
results.content: [Skip to main content](https://www.scquantum.org/about/quantum-computing-applications-8-real-world-use-cases-2026#main_content). [South Carolina Quantum](https://www.scquantum.org/). [Menu](https://www.scquantum.org/about/quantum-computing-applications-8-real-world-use-cases-2026#). *   [About](https://www.scquantum.org/about)[Open About](https://www.scquantum.org/about/quantum-computing-applications-8-real-world-use-cases-2026). *   [- 8 Real-World Use Cases in 2026](https://www.scquantum.org/about/quantum-computing-applications-8-real-world-use-cases-2026)[- 8 Real-World Use Cases in 2026](https://www.scquantum.org/about/quantum-computing-applications-8-real-world-use-cases-2026). *   [Educate](https://www.scquantum.org/educate)[Open Educate](https://www.scquantum.org/about/quantum-computing-applications-8-real-world-use-cases-2026). *   [Collaborate](https://www.scquantum.org/collaborate)[Open Collaborate](https://www.scquantum.org/about/quantum-computing-applications-8-real-world-use-cases-2026). *   [The Quantum Thread (News & Insights)](https://www.scquantum.org/quantum-thread). In cybersecurity, [quantum encryption](https://www.scquantum.org/about/quantum-technologies "Quantum Technologies") enhances data security by offering methods that are resistant to future cyber threats. Organizations are exploring [quantum key distribution (QKD)](https://www.scquantum.org/about/quantum-technologies) to create secure communication channels that detect interception attempts and ensure data confidentiality. Today, researchers and pharmaceutical leaders are exploring how [quantum computing](https://www.scquantum.org/news/quantum-computing-drug-design-where-quantum-meets-chemistry "Quantum Computing for Drug Design: Where Quantum Meets Chemistry") might offer a better way forward. [The logistics industry](https://www.scquantum.org/news/building-smarter-supply-chains-quantum-logistics) relies on complex systems requiring instant decisions. [Quantum technologies](https://www.scquantum.org/about/quantum-technologies "Quantum Technologies") contribute to reducing energy consumption and lowering carbon emissions by optimizing various logistics operations, promoting sustainability across industries. *   **Cybersecurity**: The push for [quantum-safe encryption](https://www.scquantum.org/about/quantum-technologies "Quantum Technologies") is driving urgent adoption across governments and enterprises. [Read More](https://www.scquantum.org/about/quantum-technologies). [Read More](https://www.scquantum.org/about/quantum-applications). [Read More](https://www.scquantum.org/about/why-quantum). [South Carolina Quantum](https://www.scquantum.org/).

results.title: 7 Quantum Computing Trends That Will Shape Industries in 2026
results.content: # 7 Quantum Computing Trends That Will Shape Industries in 2026. Quantum computing is finally stepping out of research labs and into the real world. As we approach 2026, several clear trends are emerging that will define how quantum computing is actually used. Quantum computing and artificial intelligence are converging into a powerful new field often referred to as **Quantum AI**. Quantum computers won’t replace classical systems overnight — and they don’t need to. Quantum computing is shaping up to be the next competitive frontier for cloud platforms, much like AI and GPUs were in recent years. 2026 is shaping up to be a turning point for quantum computing — not because the technology is fully mature, but because organizations are finally learning how to use it effectively. The organizations that start building quantum literacy today, experiment with hybrid systems, and prepare their security infrastructure early will be best positioned to unlock the real value of quantum computing when it truly scales.
